column2: The current DB format is the old format. \r\nPlease extract the DB from the game file again.
You need to update the DB to run this application. Please run this application again to update the DB.
The DB does not exist. It is necessary to extract the DB from the game file. Please wait for a while until the data extraction screen starts up.
You need to create a DB to run this application. Please run this application again to update the DB.
Failed to open the DB. It may be possible to start it by extracting the DB from the game file. Do you want to update the DB?
Saved the layout of plan "{0}" as "{1}".
Saved the layout of plan "{0}" as "{1}" overwriting it.
No tab is selected to save the layout.\r\nSelect the tab you want to save, and run it again.
Do you want to display the DB update screen? \r\nPlease wait for a moment until the screen starts.
Failed to update the DB, \r\nplease check if the DB file is accessible and try again.
There are some unsaved items. Do you want to save it?
Do you want to save the changes to your plan "{0}"?
Do you really want to delete the layout "{0}"?
Invalid layout name. Please enter at least one non-white space character.

Please copy the URL.
Note: The following modules are excluded.
・Connection module
・Venture module
Please enter the URL displayed when you click the \r\nShare button at the top of Station Calclator.
Do you want to merge duplicate modules?
Do you want to add a module to produce the missing product?
The module was not added because there is no missing product.
You can add a selection at once by clicking while holding down the left Shift key.
Do you want to save your changes?
Do you really want to remove the preset "{0}"?
Invalid preset name. Please enter at least one non-white space character.
